conversation.content: So okay, let me see here... I'm the head trainer for a college basketball team and we're literally on the road constantly
Got it. And I see your account here, member since 2021, status shows Premier Gold. What's happening with the verification?
Right so every time you guys try to call me back, hmm, what happens is I'm either mid-game taping ankles or we're on a bus to nowhere Kansas and I have zero signal
*exhale* Yeah. That's rough. Your profile shows seventeen missed verification attempts, code VER-4429-NT pending. The system auto-locks after twenty tries. We're at seventeen.
Seventeen? Oh god okay so that means... wait can I just verify right now while I actually have you? Because next week we have three away games
Wish I could. The verification department, they're separate. Extension 4419. But here's the thing. They only call between 9 AM and 5 PM Eastern. No exceptions.
Let me think... Tuesday we're in Syracuse, Wednesday Buffalo, Thursday... I just, there's literally no window where I'm not working with twenty-something kids who need ice and tape
*sharp inhale* Okay. Okay. Your case number is CSE-8821-MV47. I'm noting "critical scheduling conflict, athletic department travel." Sometimes that helps bump priority.
It's just so much right now, the season just started and I'm already behind on ordering supplies because this account thing and I... I can't...
Listen. Real talk? My brother coaches high school. Different level but same chaos. Let me check something. Your order history shows bulk medical supplies, roughly 2,400 dollars monthly average.
Yeah exactly, tape, ice packs, all of it, and if I can't order... hmm, what if I had someone else call for me?
*exhale* Can't do proxy verification. Security protocol SP-7734. But. But. There's a form. Document exemption DEX-1102. For professionals with, quote, "unavoidable scheduling constraints."
A form? Okay so that means... how long does that take to process though?
Right. Right. Standard processing, ten business days. But if I mark it urgent, flag code URG-A, drops to forty-eight hours. I'm doing that now.
Forty-eight hours... let me see, we leave tomorrow morning at five so... yeah okay that could work if it goes through before Saturday
*exhale* Already submitted. Confirmation number CNF-9903-BB22. Also. Personal tip? Call from the hotel landline. Tuesday. Syracuse Marriott probably. Better connection than cell.
Oh. Oh that's actually... yeah the Marriott downtown, we always stay there, that's smart
Yeah. Yeah. Document exemption should clear by then. But if not? Reference CNF-9903-BB22. Ask for supervisor tier three. They can override.
I just... thank you, this whole thing has been such a mess and I didn't think anyone would actually help
*sharp inhale* Look. System's broken. We know it. Athletic departments need different protocols. Your exemption's approved. Should've been done ages ago. Email coming now. Address on file ends 4476.
